mapper.select: select * from check_item_info
select count(*) as total from check_report
mapper.insert: insert into check_report values (#{doc_no}, #{facility_code}, #{check_date}::date, #{weather}, #{user_id}, #{check_result}, #{spec_memo}, current_date, current_date)
mapper.select: select * from (select row_number() over() as rn,ui.user_name, cr.*, wr.facility_category, org.org_name, ar.org_area_name from check_report cr join water_resources wr on cr.facility_code = wr.facility_code INNER JOIN org_area ar ON wr.org_area = ar.org_area INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION org ON wr.org_code = org.org_code INNER JOIN user_info ui ON cr.user_id = ui.user_id order by rn)

select * from (select row_number() over() as rn,ui.user_name, cr.*, wr.facility_category, org.org_name, ar.org_area_name from check_report cr join water_resources wr on cr.facility_code = wr.facility_code INNER JOIN org_area ar ON wr.org_area = ar.org_area INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION org ON wr.org_code = org.org_code INNER JOIN user_info ui ON cr.user_id = ui.user_id order by rn) offset #{start}-1 limit 10

select * from ( select row_number() over() as rn,ui.user_name, cr.doc_no, cr.facility_code, to_char(cr.modify_datetime, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as check_date, cr.weather, cr.user_id, cr.check_result, cr.spec_memo,wr.facility_category, org.org_name, ar.org_area_name,ui.user_department from check_report cr join water_resources wr on cr.facility_code = wr.facility_code INNER JOIN org_area ar ON wr.org_area =ar.org_area INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION org ON wr.org_code =org.org_code INNER JOIN user_info ui ON cr.user_id =ui.user_id where wr.facility_category like '%' || #{facility_category} || '%' and ar.org_area like '%' || #{org_area} || '%' and org.org_name like '%' || #{org_name} || '%' and ui.user_department like '%' || #{user_department} || '%' and cr.facility_code like '%' || #{facility_code} || '%'
order by rn
and cr.modify_datetime <= #{secdate} order by rn
and cr.modify_datetime >= #{firstdate} order by rn
and cr.modify_datetime between #{firstdate} and #{secdate} order by rn
) offset #{start}-1 limit 10
select * from observation
select * from ORGANIZATION
select * from org_area
select count(*) as total from water_resources wr, organization org where wr.org_code = org.org_code
select facility_category from water_resources group by facility_category
select facility_addr from water_resources group by facility_addr order by facility_addr

select ROW_NUMBER() over() as rn, * from (select wr.*, org.org_name, split_part(wr.facility_addr::varchar, ' ', 1) as first_area, split_part(wr.facility_addr::varchar, ' ', 2) as second_area from water_resources wr, organization org where wr.org_code = org.org_code order by facility_code)

select ROW_NUMBER() over() as rn, * from (select cd.cate_name, wr.*, org.org_name, split_part(wr.facility_addr::varchar, ' ', 1) as first_area, split_part(wr.facility_addr::varchar, ' ', 2) as second_area from water_resources wr, organization org, code cd where wr.org_code = org.org_code and wr.facility_type = cd.cate_code order by facility_code) offset #{start}-1 limit 10

select ROW_NUMBER() over() as rn, tab.facility_category,tab.facility_code,tab.facility_addr,tab.org_area_name, tab.firstdate,cc.check_result,ui.user_name, tab.org_name,ui.user_department from ( select wr.facility_category,wr.facility_code,wr.facility_addr,oz.org_area_name, cr.firstdate, org.org_name, (select max(doc_no) from check_report where facility_code = wr.facility_code) as doc_no from water_resources wr left outer join (select distinct to_char(max(modify_datetime),'yyyy-MM-dd') as firstdate, facility_code from check_report group by facility_code)cr on wr.facility_code = cr.facility_code
left join org_area oz on wr.org_area = oz.org_area left join organization org on wr.org_area = org.org_area ) as tab left join check_report cc on cc.doc_no = tab.doc_no left join user_info ui on cc.user_id = ui.user_id
offset #{start}-1 limit 10
select * from (select wr.facility_addr from water_resources wr, organization org where wr.org_code = org.org_code and wr.facility_category = #{facility_category} order by facility_code)

select cr.facility_code,wr.facility_category,cd.cate_name, cr.check_result,cr.spec_memo, cr.doc_no, cr.user_id, to_char(cr.modify_datetime,'yyyy-MM-dd') as modify_datetime, cr.weather, ui.user_department, ui.user_position, ui.user_name from check_report cr left join water_resources wr on cr.facility_code = wr.facility_code left join code cd on wr.facility_type = cd.cate_code left join user_info ui on cr.user_id = ui.user_id where doc_no = #{doc_no}
select * from check_list where doc_no = #{doc_no}

select row_number() over() as rn,* from ( select cl.facility_code,cl.doc_no,cd.cate_code,cl.checklist_no, cd.cate_name as check_category,cd2.cate_name as check_item,cl.check_grade,cl.note from check_list cl left join ( select * from code where field_name = 'check_category' --or field_name='check_item' ) cd on cl.check_category = cd.cate_code left join ( select * from code where field_name='check_item' ) cd2 on cl.check_item = cd2.cate_code where doc_no = #{doc_no} order by cate_code, checklist_no desc)

select ROW_NUMBER() over() as rn,* from ( select cr.doc_no,cr.facility_code,to_char(cr.modify_datetime, 'yyyy-MM-dd')as modify_datetime,cr.check_result,cr.spec_memo,code.cate_name,user_info.user_name From check_report cr left join water_resources wr on cr.facility_code = wr.facility_code left join code on wr.facility_type = code.cate_code left join user_info on cr.user_id = user_info.user_id where cr.facility_code = #{facility_code} order by cr.doc_no desc ) offset #{start}-1 limit 10

select count(*) as total from ( select cr.doc_no,cr.facility_code,to_char(cr.modify_datetime, 'yyyy-MM-dd')as modify_datetime,cr.check_result,cr.spec_memo,code.cate_name,user_info.user_name From check_report cr left join water_resources wr on cr.facility_code = wr.facility_code left join code on wr.facility_type = code.cate_code left join user_info on cr.user_id = user_info.user_id where cr.facility_code = #{facility_code} order by cr.doc_no desc )
select * from observation order by observe_post offset #{start}-1 limit 30
select count(*) as total from observation
